Reviews.Title: Do not buy it.
Reviews.Author: Teriiyakii
Reviews.Content: This case is ridiculously fragile. This is not built for hanging onto your waist belt at all. Trust me you will regret spend so much money on this crappy case...

Reviews.Title: Warning: too tight a fit for Sony NEX-7
Reviews.Author: G. Lewis "discriminating consumer"
Reviews.Content: Even though the product is listed as being compatible in the Accessories Booklet that came with the Sony NEX-7 I recently purchased from Amazon, it's difficult to get the camera in and out of this case. I would not recommend it for any NEX-7 owner who needs to be able to quickly access their camera.
